item.title: How to Build and Host a Website with Hugo
item.description: This is a concise, step-by-step guide on how to build a website - just like this one - with Hugo, and host it on Github. Follow the steps and check out the links for further explanation on each component. This guide is made for non-experts, because I found most Hugo tutorials utterly useless and sparse for people new to computers web-development. Table of Contents Link to heading 1. Requirements 2. Building the Website

item.title: How to Publish a Python Package: A Rudimentary Pipeline
item.description: PIPELINE Link to heading This is a concise step by step rough-guide on how to package and publish an open source python project, accompanied by an auto-generated documentation website (readthedocs.io).
